alert.note: Alert for Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 06 at 9:46AM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest and Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley, and Carmel Valley. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest
